Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory922.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'While Konstantin Mining Facility might seem mundane enough on the ground, its underground structures resemble those of a magnificent inverted tower when viewed in isolation.'}
{3: 'Mining tunnels sprawl in all directions, nearly hollowing out the entire foundation beneath the wilderness, with all the small labs dotting the branches of these tunnels.'}
{3: 'With easy access to raw materials, these researchers hardly ever leave their posts, completely absorbed in their work.'}
{3: 'Everyone understands that the deeper a laboratory is located, the more advanced and cutting-edge its research becomes—a fact never explicitly stipulated to them.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory255.png'}
{3: 'As they negotiate the winding path, the intermingled trails of vital fluid and blood grow more frequent.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Silla was still chasing after them... He should have gone back for reinforcements.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "He won't last long, not when he's lost such a big amount of vital fluid...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'On the ground, the trail of vital fluid abruptly ends, but the blood continues to streak forward.'}
{3: 'Clear drag marks extend toward a side tunnel, where a shadowy figure lies motionless on the ground.'}
{2: 'Wait, it could be a trap.', 3: '22'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You gesture toward Lucia, who, having acknowledged your gesture with a nod, produces a flare and tosses it out ever so carefully.'}
{3: "The cold light reveals the Construct's body, now completely devoid of vital signs."}
{3: "Pain pierces through her M.I.N.D., but Bridget fights to stay calm, clenching her fists as she steps forward to examine Silla's body."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "...It's a gunshot wound near the core. That's what caused his vital fluid to leak out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Those people hiding in the mines, they've got to be the ones behind this.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'There might be more than one group involved.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With its surface dusted, the rock now reveals deeply embedded footprints—far too deep to have been left by any normal human.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "...I'm sure you put up a good fight, Silla.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget gently closes Silla's open eyes."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'll take it from here for you.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget marks Silla's location in the mine tunnel, her eyes now dark with resolve."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Let's keep moving. There's still blood on the ground—we might catch up to them before they can do anything else.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Is it possible that this teammate of yours, well... maybe he accepted something from An Jie and her people, but then things went south during negotiations, and they ended up in a fight?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Impossible.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'What makes you say so, though?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bridget shoots Trojan a quick glance.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "There was this incident that I've experienced, and... I don't know if I'd call it betrayal.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bridget', 3: "After my promotion to my current position as Support Force Captain, I conducted thorough background checks on all squad members. I've also carefully scrutinized the records of every new recruit joining our ranks.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Feeling called out, Trojan rubs his nose awkwardly.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Besides, without third-party assistance, it would have been impossible for An Jie and her deputy to hurt Silla.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I want to believe that An Jie, too, was likely coerced into leaving by a third party.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'The trail leads to... here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It appears to be the drainage system in the mine, wet and muddy from constant use.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: '...Would they really build their laboratory in a place like this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Heh, you never know what they're capable of.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "This place? It's nothing. They'd burrow into bedrock if they could. Some things are meant to stay in the dark, after all.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'You seem quite familiar with all this.', 3: '61', 4: 'Why are you so familiar with this place?', 5: '62'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Am I? I wouldn't know.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Am I? I wouldn't know.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Perhaps it's because we're both inferior beings—that's why we think alike.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Does Trojan really have no recollections whatsoever? Bridget watches cautiously as Trojan walks ahead.'}
{3: 'Why does she seem so familiar with this place? And what exactly... is she trying to do here?'}
{2: 'Lucia and I will help.', 3: '71'}
{3: "Ever since entering the mine, Bridget has been on edge, meticulously planning every move. Yet despite such careful precautions, she's been losing one comrade after another all the same."}
{3: "Bridget's self-reproach threatens to overflow the dilapidated sewers."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just... just thinking about what we should do next.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Cheryl should have the transceiver fixed soon. At least we'll be able to maintain communications among ourselves, and then...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget lets out a long sigh.'}
{3: "She's well aware of how unusual she herself has been acting lately."}
{3: "Worry and doubt consume her as those nightmares, which until now she's been suppressing, resurface. All these negative emotions came bursting out at the sight of Silla's corpse."}
{3: 'A dark volcano has broken loose within her M.I.N.D.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Don't worry. I'm sure I'll get a grip on myself soon enough.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Let's keep moving.", 4: '1'}
